verses.arabic: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.english: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].
verses.hausa: Sã'a ta yi kusa, kuma wata ya tsãge.

verses.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.english: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan sun ga wata ãyã, sai su juya baya su ce: "Sihiri ne mai dõgẽwa!"

verses.arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.english: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ƙaryata, kuma suka bi son zũciyarsu, alhãli kuwa kõwane al'amari (wanda suke son su tũre daga Annabi) an tabbatar da shi.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.english: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, abin da yake akwai tsãwatarwa a cikinsa na lãbãraiya zo musu.

verses.arabic: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَـٰلِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.english: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].
verses.hausa: Hikima cikakka! Sai dai abũbuwan gargaɗi bã su amfãni.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.english: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ka bar su! Rãnar da mai kiran zai yi kira zuwa ga wani abu abin ƙyama.

verses.arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.english: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
verses.hausa: ¡asƙantattu ga idanunsu zã su fito daga kaburburansu, kamar dai sũ fãri ne waɗandasuka wãtse.

verses.arabic: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.english: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
verses.hausa: Sunã gaggãwar tafiya zuwa ga mai kiran, kãfirai na cẽwa, "Wannan yini ne mai wuya!"

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌ وَٱزْدُجِرَ
verses.english: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.
verses.hausa: Mutãnen Nũhu sun ƙaryata, a gabãninsu, sai suka ƙaryata BawanMu, kuma suka ce: "Shi mahaukaci ne." Kuma aka tsãwace shi.

verses.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌ فَٱنتَصِرْ
verses.english: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ya kira Ubangijinsa (ya ce), "Lalle nĩ, an rinjãye ni, sai Ka yi taimako."

verses.arabic: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.english: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
verses.hausa: Sai Muka bũɗe kõfõfin sama da ruwa mai zuba.

verses.arabic: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.english: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka ɓuɓɓugar da ƙasã ta zama idãnun ruwa, daɗa ruwa ya haɗu a kan wani umurni da aka riga aka ƙaddara shi.

verses.arabic: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.english: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka ɗauke Nũhu a kan (jirgi) na alluna da ƙũsõshi.

verses.arabic: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.english: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.
verses.hausa: Tanã gudãna, a kan idãnunMu, dõmin sakamako ga wanda aka yi wa kãfircin.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, Mun bar ta ta zama ãyã. To, Shin, akwai mai tunãni

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
verses.hausa: To, yãyã azãbãTa take da gargaɗiNa?

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩkƙa, Mun sauƙaƙe Alƙur'ãni, dõmin tunãwa. To, shin, akwai mai tunãwa?

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
verses.hausa: Ãdãwa sun ƙaryata, to, yãya azãbãTa take, da gargaɗiNa?

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, Mun aika da iska mai tsananin sauti a kansu, a cikin wani yinin nahĩsa mai dõgẽwa.

verses.arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.english: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.
verses.hausa: Tanã fizgar mutãne kamar dai sũ kututturan dabĩno tumɓukakku ne.

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
verses.hausa: To, yãya azãbãTa take da gargaɗiNa?

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙiƙa Mun sauƙaƙe Alƙur'ani, dõmin tunãwa. To, shin, akwai mai tunãwa?

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.english: Thamud denied the warning
verses.hausa: Samũdãwa sun ƙaryata game da gargaɗin.

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.english: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
verses.hausa: Sai suka ce: "Wani mutum daga cikinmu, shi kaɗai, wai mu bĩ shi! Lalle mũ a lõkacin, haƙĩƙa mun shiga wata ɓata da haukã.

verses.arabic: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.english: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
verses.hausa: "Shin, an jẽfa masa Manzancin ne, a tsakãninmu? Ã'a, shĩ dai gawurtaccen maƙaryaci ne mai girman kai!"

verses.arabic: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ
verses.english: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
verses.hausa: Zã su sani a gõbe, wãne ne gawurtaccen mai ƙaryar, mai girman kan?

verses.arabic: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ
verses.english: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, mãsu aikãwa da rãƙumar ne, ta zame musu fitina, sai ka tsare su da kallo, kuma ka yi haƙuri.

verses.arabic: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.english: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
verses.hausa: Kuma ka bã su lãbãri cẽwa ruwa rababbe ne a tsakãninsu (da rãƙumar), kõwane sha, mai shi yanã halartar sa.

verses.arabic: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.english: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
verses.hausa: Sai suka kira abokinsu, sai ya karɓa, sa'an nan ya sõke ta,

verses.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
verses.hausa: To, yãya azãbaTa take da gargaɗiNa?

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, Mun aika tsãwa guda a kansu, sai suka kasance kamar yãyin mai shinge.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun sauƙaƙe Alƙur'ani, dõmin tunãwa. To, shin, akwai mai tunãwa?

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.english: The people of Lot denied the warning.
verses.hausa: Mutãnen Lũɗu sun ƙaryata, game da gargaɗi.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn
verses.hausa: Lalle Mun aika iskar tsakuwa a kansu, fãce mabiyan Lũɗu, Mun tsirar da su a lõkacin asuba.

verses.arabic: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ
verses.english: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.
verses.hausa: Sabõda wata ni'ima ta daga gare Mu. Kamar haka Muke sãka wa wanda ya gõde.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.english: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa, ya yi musu gargaɗin damƙarMu, sai suka yi musu game da gargaɗin.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle haƙĩƙa, su, sun nẽme shi ta wajen bãƙinsa, sai Muka shãfe idãnunsu. "To, ku ɗanɗani azãbaTa da gargaɗĩNa."

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.english: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa, wata azãba matabbaciya tã wãye musu gari da yãƙi, tun da sãfe.

verses.arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.english: So taste My punishment and warning.
verses.hausa: To, ku ɗanɗani azãbãTa da gargaɗĩNa.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun sauƙaƙe Alƙur, ani dõmin tunãwa. To, shin, akwai mai tunãwa?

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.english: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa, gargaɗin ya jẽ wa mabiyan Fir'auna.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.english: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
verses.hausa: Sun ƙaryata game da ãyõyinMu, dukansu sai Muka kãma su, irin kãmun Mabuwãyi, Mai ĩkon yi.

verses.arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.english: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?
verses.hausa: Shin, kãfiranku ne mafi alhẽri daga waɗancan, ko kuwa kunã da wata barã'a a cikin littattafai?

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.english: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?
verses.hausa: Kõ zã su ce: "Mũ duka mãsu haɗa ƙarfi ne dõmin cin nasara?"

verses.arabic: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.english: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].
verses.hausa: Zã a karya tãron, kuma su jũya bãya dõmin gudu.

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.english: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, Sã'a ita cẽ lõkacin wa'adinsu, kuma Sã'ar tã fi tsananin masĩfa, kuma ta fiɗãci.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, mãsu laifi sunã a cikin ɓata da hauka.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.english: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
verses.hausa: Rãnar da zã a jã su a cikin wuta a kan fuskõkinsu. "Ku ɗanɗani shãfar wutar Saƙar."

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.english: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, kõwane irin abu Mun halitta shi a kan tsãri.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ
verses.english: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.
verses.hausa: Kuma umurninMu bai zamo ba fãce da kalma ɗaya, kamar walƙãwar ido.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.english: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa, Mun halaka irin gayyarku. To, shin, akwai mai tunãni?

verses.arabic: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.english: And everything they did is in written records.
verses.hausa: Kuma kõwane abu, da suka aikata shi, yanã a cikin littattafai.

verses.arabic: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.english: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
verses.hausa: Kuma dukkan ƙarami da babba, rubutacce ne.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,
verses.hausa: Lalle mãsu taƙawa sunã a cikin gidãjen Aljanna da kõguna.

verses.arabic: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ
verses.english: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.
verses.hausa: A cikin mazaunin gaskiya, wurin Mai ikon yi, Mai iya zartaswa.
